    Creator

    January 9, 2019 - January 9, 2021

    Software Engineer | Claire's (personal project) | Remote

    Built a full-stack application where a user can view clothes, add to cart, and make a purchase. Built a database to store clothing information using MongoDB. Implemented firebase plugin for auth authentication. Built graphs using Google Charts library and jQuery for visualization of sales metrics.
